query: SELECT r.name as region_name, COUNT(p.id) as product_count FROM products p JOIN regions r ON p.region_id = r.id GROUP BY r.id, r.name ORDER BY product_count DESC;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2LSjgciXE5U7gJN.root --database AE5tzfuADY2nWPRKhfHJC3 --execute SELECT r.name as region_name, COUNT(p.id) as product_count FROM products p JOIN regions r ON p.region_id = r.id GROUP BY r.id, r.name ORDER BY product_count DESC;
